name: Just Shut Up and Drive
description:
First released as a flash game in 2010 (and became quite popular, grabbing 71 million views in 4 years), we decided that "Just Shut up and Drive" should also be available as a downloadable game.

  • Fast-paced arcade racing, inspired by retro classics
  • 10 challenging tracks with colorful scenery
  • Rivals to beat & random traffic on each track
  • Original soundtrack
A note from Umut: ! ---  This is the  * Final Cut *  version  --- !   Original flash version was notoriously difficult because I somehow thought this was good design back then, so I adjusted a lot of values in this final cut version. It has become much more enjoyable, I hope you won’t be punching walls now. This version also has many visual improvements and doesn't have the old sponsor brandings. Enjoy!

You can follow us at Twitter and Discord.

Q: Controller support? --- A: Not available for the moment, but you can google & use Joy2key. Q: I remember a different driving game named Shut up and Drive? --- A: There is an upcoming game (as of 2021) and for a while it was using this name. When I realized how this can be confusing among players, I contacted to the game's dev and shared my concerns. Happily, he considered all options and kindly decided to change his game's name to "Buck up and Drive" for both games' sake. Don't forget to check it out too, it's a great looking game!
